creator: cyberguy91
title: Set Default Folder When Launching Microsoft Outlook 2007
description: This Instructable guides users on how to modify Microsoft Outlook 2007's startup behavior to open a specific folder by default. It involves navigating through the Outlook settings to access advanced options and select the desired folder.
steps: Open the "Options" window by clicking on "Tools" then "Options".
Switch to the "Other" tab in the "Options" window.
Open the "Advanced Options" window by clicking the "Advanced Options" button in the "Other" tab.
Click the "Browse" button in the "Advanced Options" window to view and choose a default folder.
After selecting the desired folder, click "OK" on each window to return to the main Outlook window.
Close and relaunch Outlook to test if the changes were applied correctly. Outlook should now open to the selected folder.
